Grinnell College Press is a student organization which works with writers and artists on campus to design and print (a collection of) their work in a cohesive and beautiful publication.

Our current publications (released in Spring 2018) are:

  • The Foodhouse Cookbook by Grinnell College Foodhouse
  • Drawings from Copenhagen by Sam Nakahira
  • The Silence of Lavender and Blood by Nicole Polglaze
  • Contemporary Frames by Puravi Nath
